title: Miami Heat
description: In this Dateline classic, a drive by shooting tears a Miami family apart and Cindy Carballo is left wondering who could have killed her husband. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on July 10, 2015.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
